data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Star Dojran, North Macedonia to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Star Dojran, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Star Dojran that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 399 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Star Dojran hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Star Dojran who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

Jesus, I pray that all the Albanian, Macedonian people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Albanian, Macedonian people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Albanian, Macedonian people is yours.
Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Star Dojran to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 247 people in the state of Star Dojran who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Star Dojran, North Macedonia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
